import React from "react"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; const NavBar = () => { return (
isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/customers" > Customers isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/vendors" > Vendors isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/products" > Products isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/payments" > Payments isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/receipts" > Receipts isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/salesinvoices" > Sales Invoices isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/purchaseinvoices" > Purchase Invoices isActive ? "nav-link active" : "nav-link" } to="/ledger" > Ledger
); }; export default NavBar;
